prompts: Create a snake-like Pokemon that blends in with the forest environment.
Imagine a poison-type Pokemon with vibrant purple and yellow scales.
Show me a serpentine creature that uses stealth to attack its opponents.
Generate a Pokemon that evolves into a larger, more intimidating snake.
Design a Pokemon with unique markings that represent its poisonous abilities.
Give me a small, sneaky Pokemon that has a playful yet cunning personality.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and is skilled at ambush attacks.
